purpose: Authoritative definitions for VCA measurement logic

shaftPlane.note: Impact shaft should not return exactly to address due to shaft lean, droop, and rotation.

coachingRules.confidenceRule: All metrics must report confidence and source.
coachingRules.p6Truth: If shaft and face are functional at P6, P7 is largely predetermined.
coachingRules.transitionRule: P3 to P5 change is contextual, not moral.
